name: Solar Storms
description: The planet is rocked by a long series of solar flares. The sudden spikes in activity wreak havoc on the colony's electrical systems.
warning: We've been tracking solar activity, and it will be reaching it peak soon. We should brace for the worst.

success.message: We've handled the worst of what the sun has to offer. We've even used the excess energy to our benefit.

failure.message: Lacking time to properly prepare, the sudden electrical storms severely damage core equipment.

name: Algal Bloom
description: Native algae populations explode as a result of the changing climate. Ocean life and water access is crucially threatened.
warning: The terraforming process always has consequences. It looks like the oceans are seeing rampant and unforeseen algae growth.

success.message: Your preparations paid off. Scientists have maintained adequate water supplies, stabilized the ocean, and learned a great deal in the process.

failure.message: Despite your best efforts, ocean life systems are ravaged by the algal bloom and colony water resources teeter on the brink.

name: Radiation Clouds
description: Traveling pockets of radiation are a constant threat on this alien world. These anomalies threaten all life on the colony.
warning: All planets undergoing terraforming are hostile, this one more than most. Data shows an enormous cloud of something dangerous headed our way.

success.message: The colony prepared for the worst. Most of our personnel remain healthy and, while we lost a lot of time, our life systems are thriving.

failure.message: We have lost not just valuable personnel, but friends, and our organic resources are terribly damaged. Moving on from this will be difficult.

name: Worker Strikes
description: The science of terraforming is built on the hard work of people filling many different roles. If the population isn't happy, nothing gets done.
warning: Not everyone who joined this project knew what to expect. Moral is becoming dangerously low. If unrest stays at this level, it will threaten the entire project.

success.message: Despite some serious dissent, the population has buckled down and recommitted themselves to the project. We learned a valuable lesson here.

failure.message: Massive strike have continued, leaving the colony short-handed and struggling to finish many crucial projects.

name: Drought
description: Weather patterns are never very predictable, especially as the terraforming process changes the atmosphere. Right now, a drought is strangling the colony's resource.
warning: Our resources are fine for now, but if this dry-spell continues, this project could be ruined by the weather. It wouldn't tbe first time nature impeded our efforts.

success.message: The drought is almost over Commander. Our advanced research has helped us overcome even nature's wrath.

failure.message: This drought has forced us to slow our progress and the population is struggling under strict water rationing. We'll survive, but not comfortably.

name: Volcanic Activity
description: Volcanic exlosions have filled the air with dangerous gases and polluted our fields with ash, dangerous to our plants and animal life.
warning: This planet's geology is still very much active. You may have felt some tremors lately. I'm afraid that's only the beginning.

success.message: Thankfully, with some smart improvements in our agriculture projects, we adapted to and overcome the threat.

failure.message: Lacking time to properly prepare, the sudden electrical storms severely damage core equipment.

name: Animal Attacks
description: Roaming bands of wild animals have been on the rise, threatening not just the livestock, but the scientists and workers in the field.
warning: We just had our second wild animal attack on a scientist this week alone. This planet's native wildlife is more dangerous than we imagined. Something must be done.

success.message: We have increased safety both inside and outside the compound. The wildlife are still dangerous, but we've never been more prepared than now.

failure.message: Our increased security isn't enough. We've lost too many livestock and have had to reduce the numbers of worker hours spent outside the compound.

name: Equipment Degradation
description: The hostile climate is slowly eroding the project's necessary equipment. Repairs and replacements may prove costly for us.
warning: We're living in the future, but we still get equipment that breaks down faster than expected. We have to manage our resources wisely.

success.message: Thanks to some valuable resource gathering, we have managed to keep the most important equipment working while we await a resupply.

failure.message: We have rationed what we can, but many critical systems are still barely functioning.

name: Political Crisis
description: The colonist ship is having doubts about your command. They are threatening to withhold supplies and moral is suffering.
warning: One of the reasons I signed up for this job was to escape all the damn politics. I should have known you can't escape politics.

success.message: Thanks to your political acumen, you managed to calm the colonists and maintain control on this rock. Well done.

failure.message: The damned main fleet has us by the... well, you know. This is costly. Damned fools.

name: Mega-Storm
description: Massive floods and ferocious winds threaten to destroy structures and abolish sensitive agriculture efforts.
warning: Our weather predictions don't look to good. This coming storm will make the monsoons back home look like a sprinkle.

success.message: We laugh in the face of a little rain. Thanks to your efforts, we're just a little water-logged.

failure.message: Our agriculture projects are severely damaged. I almost drowned myself. This is a major setback.
